text: Ana'ma hutesige'za, Jerusalemi vahe'ma ha'ma eme huzmantesaza vahe'ma, ana krimo'ma zamahe ofri'nige'za mani'naza vahe'mo'za, mago mago kafurera Jerusalemi kumate mareri'za Kini ne' Monafi sondia vahe'mofo Ra Anumzana monora ome hunente'za, Anumzamo'ma zamavareno'ma e'nea zanku'ma fugagi nompima mani'nezama nezama kre'za nene'za musema nehaza knaraminkura musena eme hugahaze.
